title: Development Process of a BIPA Program Writing Assessment Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate Indonesian grammar and basic writing proficiency
context.additional_context: A program for current practitioners to enhance workplace applicability by incorporating Indonesian writing proficiency into assessment models.

learning_goals: Learners can design Indonesian language writing assessment tools using mixed assessment methods (written exams, assignments, portfolios, direct observation).
Learners can apply writing assessment criteria that exclude the influence of technological tools (Google Translate, AI translators) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop a rubric reflecting five or more assessment criteria, including grammar, vocabulary, topic relevance, and textual coherence.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
